person.persName: Thomas Averitt (Marion County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, and postmaster)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Averitt. Father of William Averitt. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Marion County in 1860. United States postmaster in Marion County in 1862. Dry goods merchant in Marion County in 1863.
